Osejs.Information.Title: Periodic
Osejs.Information.Abstract: N equal masses are moving in the same plane under the action of the mutual gravitational attraction. If the initial conditions are chosen in the right way, some periodic solutions of a very special kind may be found: all particles move along the same orbit and the total angular momentum vanishes in the center-of-mass system. One can see some examples in this simulation.
Osejs.Information.Author: Juan M. Aguirregabiria (http://tp.lc.ehu.es/jma.html)

PreliminaryCode.Comment: Code to be executed before rate equations are evaluated

Content.Comment: Select orbit and the corresponding data

Osejs.View.Creation.Element.Property: Number of points in each orbit
